details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.10 Fonts - 6.2.10.7 Unicode character maps - Valid Unicode values
details.description: If a ToUnicode CMap is present, the Unicode values specified there shall all be greater than zero (0), but not equal to either U+FEFF or U+FFFE.

rule.description: If a ToUnicode CMap is present, the Unicode values specified there shall all be greater than zero (0), but not equal to either U+FEFF or U+FFFE.

error.message: The glyph has an invalid Unicode value, which is either 0, or is equal to U+FEFF or U+FFFE
